name: Vanadium(II) chloride
desc: Vanadium(II) chloride is the inorganic compound with the formula VCl2, and is the most reduced vanadium chloride. Vanadium(II) chloride is an apple-green solid that dissolves in water to give purple solutions.

images.alt: Plan view of a single layer in the crystal structure of vanadium(II) chloride
